name: Back To The Future Postcard
description:
This thing is pretty broken so it's a prototype. This was also made before Looper was released!

Made this at a gamejam with Ewan and Michael. Theme was "Postcard from the future" so we made a hitman game where you have to kill someone based on the picture attached to a postcard.

Random generation of pedestrians was a large part of this.

I took on the artist role for this project. I also programmed the station clocks but a last minute git merge broke those.

Controls:

AD to move

Space to look at postcard
